name: Tomofachi Life
description:
What happens when you take care of a Fii character and live together on an island? Tomofachi Life happens! Start by taking care of the Fii character Billy, and customizing everything about them. Have fun taking care of him.... in any way! Then watch as they grow and live their crazy Fii lives.

When you start Tomofachi Life, you will need to register/login to ICiiU networking with your username. (you can put your real name, but its reccomended to use a nickname).

If you want, you can press space again to rename yourself.

Press F for a little secret :)

Click on the shirt icon to change Billy's shirt, and click the apartment icon to change Billy's apartment style.

Now, some things just to not get a copyright:

ME, Fii AND ICiiU IS NOT AFFLIATED WITH Nintendo™ IN ANYWAY.

GO PLAY THE REAL TOMODACHI LIFE, IT'S A AMAZING GAME.

Enjoy!!
